pkgmetadata.longdescription: This library provides a Haskell implementation of <https://github.com/Automattic/engine.io Engine.IO>, a library for real-time client-server communication on the web. Engine.IO works with old browsers via XHR long-polling, and seamlessy upgrades to web sockets. This implementation supports the majority of the Engine.IO protocol, including text and binary packets and the upgrading protocol.
